tool.name: msnpy process-scans
tool.command:
#if str( $input).endswith(".dat") ln -s '$input' '$input.name' && #end if
msnpy process-scans
--input '$input.name'
#if $groups and $groups is not None: --groups $groups #end if
#if $function_noise and $function_noise is not None: --function-noise $function_noise #end if
#if $snr_threshold and $snr_threshold is not None: --snr-threshold $snr_threshold #end if
#if $ppm and $ppm is not None: --ppm $ppm #end if
#if $min_fraction and $min_fraction is not None: --min-fraction $min_fraction #end if
#if $rsd_threshold and $rsd_threshold is not None: --rsd-threshold $rsd_threshold #end if
#if $adv.normalise and $adv.normalise is not None: --normalise $adv.normalise #end if
#if $adv.repeat_6 and $adv.repeat_6 is not None: #set repeat_var_6 = '" "'.join([ str($var.exclusion_list) for $var in $adv.repeat_6 ]) --exclusion-list $repeat_var_6 #end if
#if $adv.ringing_threshold and $adv.ringing_threshold is not None: --ringing-threshold $adv.ringing_threshold #end if
--ncpus=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --output $processed_peaklists --report $processed_peaklists_report

param.name: groups
param.label: Groups
param.help: Json or gml file that includes the groups of scans

param.name: function_noise
param.label: Noise function
param.help: Function to calculate the noise from each scan
param.option: As shown in Xcalibur Qual Browser (Available for *.RAW files only)

param.label: PPM tolerance
param.help: Mass tolerance in Parts per million to group peaks across scans / mass spectra
param.name: ppm

param.label: Min fraction
param.help: Minimum fraction a peak has to be present. Use 0.0 to not apply this filter.
param.name: min_fraction

param.label: RSD threshold
param.help: Maximum threshold - relative standard deviation (Calculated for peaks that have been measured across a minimum of two scans).
param.name: rsd_threshold

param.label: Normalise
param.help: Normalise scans by Total Ion Current (TIC)
param.name: normalise
ringing_threshold
param.label: Relative intensity threshold used to remove ringing artifacts
